name: Beyond The Dark
description:
Beyond The Dark

A dark forest houses a mysterious barn. Your friend enters the forest to investigate but disappears without a trace. He uncovered mechanical secrets that changed his life forever. Will you make the plunge?

Instructions / Help:

FOLLOW THE LIGHT
FIND THE COMPUTER
ESCAPE THE FOREST

A horror prototype made to test my programming skills.

I made non of the 3D models. All models from tf3dm.com
